website_summaries.verdict: Different size options and temperature ranges set this thermometer apart.
pros: Unlike most Galileo thermometers, which have a temperature range of 64- to 80- degrees Fahrenheit, this thermometer has many temperature range options available
cons: This all-glass design is very fragile

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy It
customer_reviews.text: It was ordered 2nd time, both of these do not work properly. l dont recommend. l threw away the box it was shipped in so l can't wrap it up safely and return it plus pay return costs. Its very weird that the liquid keeps evaporating out of the sealed glass cylinder, like its gone down at least an inch and a half. I really got suckered into giving away my money for this. Hate so much. Feel so cheated.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great 500 year old technology
customer_reviews.text: This item is available in a range of sizes. It looks a little smaller than its actual measurements. Perhaps I might have ordered the next larger size - maybe next time. Its "accuracy" is +/- 2 degrees, since that's the interval between bulbs. Each bulb, which has an attached metal dangling label indicating temperature, maintains the same weight within a fixed volume. The liquid in which they are suspended however, gets less dense as it expands with higher temperature, causing the balls to sink. The lowest floating ball is the current temperature.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Item defective. The top sphere is so heavy that it keeps all the other spheres at the bottom of the tube. The sphere has obviously leaked its internal colored fluid. Item described as in Celsius, but the metal tags are Celsius on one side and Fahrenheit on the other. Really annoying if some tags are facing in the wrong direction and you want to figure out the temperature in Celsius. Would not recommend. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: David Everett

customer_reviews.title: declining quality
customer_reviews.text: I have several Galileo thermometers in various sizes. As with so many things, the quality of "the same item" has been declining over time. Be careful about going for cheap(er) versions of this item. You (don't) get what you (don't) pay for.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Already broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: This thing was wrapped in at least 5 layers of bubble wrap and it was inside a foam case, yet one of the bulbs (orange one) was already broke when it arrived thus rendering it useless. Returned and got a refund. Either they use thinner glass than necessary, or fragile things like this are just not meant to be sent through the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Henry

customer_reviews.title: This is so beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My deceased boss had one of these in his office for the 13 years that I knew him and I decided to buy one this year for my college-aged son and one for my dad. It is gorgeous! The glass is very clear and the thermometer is heavy and solid. The globes are sparkling and I love the colors. It would look great in an office, living room or bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Laura in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore the Galileo thermometer! I have a collection of these and my husband surprised me with this big one for my birthday! I absolutely adore it and look at it everyday!! The inside temperature glass beads/balls are very delicate so please handle with care! I absolutely love these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: crybott

customer_reviews.title: Tower of beauty and information
customer_reviews.text: DELICATE... First one arrived broken, it was replaced immediately at no cost to me. I love watching the orbs slowly shift with the weather. Causes many people to wonder what it is and it takes an excessive amount of time to explain to most lay persons. I love how art, science and information can merge and create such an object of beauty. I find it more accurate than typical thermometers, I based this on my use of a pyrometer.
customer_reviews.author: Yogaflex

customer_reviews.title: Quick exchange and great service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom’s birthday. She opened it and was super excited. Then we checked the temp and it was way off (roughly 20 degrees f) and I opened the app to exchange it for a new one. That was a Friday. On Sunday, the new one arrived and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Noname

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one is great, 1st one broke during shipment.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product itself and the temperature is accurate. I removed a star because the first one I received was broken! It is delicate and I'm sure it broke during shipping. The 2nd however was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: No farenheit?
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for another that I knew would eventually break. It did, Saturday. This one is beautiful right out of the box but surprised no Fragile stickers outside the box . It's bigger than my original which is fine. But why only Celsius? So instead of weather temps, it's the right temp when it's purple.
customer_reviews.author: MWinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but pretty.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but it's tiny. I'm not sure if I didn't pay close enough attention to the product listing or it wasn't noted, but I expected a much larger piece - this is about 5" or so. It doesn't make for a particularly useful thermometer, but it's pretty decor.
customer_reviews.author: R.W.

customer_reviews.title: GRAT GIFT! EDUCATIONAL BUT ALSO TASTEFULLY ARTISTIC ; THICK GLASS WITH PRISMATIC MULTICOLORED BUBBLES TO READ THE TEMP*
customer_reviews.text: MY 12 YR OLD DAUGHTER WANTS TO BE A METEOROLOGIST AND THIS IS A PERFECT GIFT. IT IS NOT ONLY EDUCATIONAL BUT ALSO TASTEFULLY ARTISTIC ; NICE THICK GLASS PRISMATIC MULTICOLORED BUBBLES WITH GOLD HANGING #'S TO EASILY READ THE TEMP*. SHE ADORES IT!
customer_reviews.author: SoBe Chic

customer_reviews.title: Great Conversation Piece!
customer_reviews.text: I have this displayed on my sideboard and it's just SO CUTE!!! I love the bright colors and it actually does give me near perfect temperature readings. It's so unique and I've bought one for a friend for Christmas. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, we received this with one of the temperature bubbles inside broken. It was a gift to my husband, so we didn't discover it was broken until after the return policy was up. It also took us a day or two to figure out why it wasn't telling us the accurate temperature. It could've been an awesome gift. I should've inspected it when I first received it.
customer_reviews.author: Kym M Sorbel

customer_reviews.title: Decorative
customer_reviews.text: Great decorative thermometer. I bought this larger one to make a trio of these guys in different sizes. I was concerned about purchasing this item for a shipped item, since it's glass, filled with liquid, but no worries....I have never seen such a well packed item lol.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Lane

customer_reviews.title: Arrives pristine
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. A little more accurate than than the one I broke. Excellent packaging. All beat up product pristine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Science and Art lovers
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement to a broken smaller one and I like the foot print of this one a little better. Accidentally knocked over the step down size and my room smelled like turpentine for months! Make sure you put it somewhere where it won't get bumped around. I like the colors and that I can look across the room and see what temp is. Great gift for those that like science and art!
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Cool thermometer. Not the best quality, but not bad either. It’s great for the price. My daughter wanted a lava lamp and I got this instead. Educational and not as dangerous. She likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: pretty, but doesn’t work unless your house is 88 degrees
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty, but totally non-functional: the only ball that floats is 88 degrees, when the room temp is 66 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and they say it absolutley gorgeous ,but the 62 ball green liquid is missing some fluid. Not broke but wont read below 64. They decided to keep it then deal with a return process.
customer_reviews.author: rnrn66

customer_reviews.title: Replaces on old one that broke.
customer_reviews.text: This is both pretty and functional. Just be sure to keep this out of direct sunlight as the colors will fade over time. I do wish this was available in a 2° increments. This is being secured with museum wax.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth P.

customer_reviews.title: Love These Thermometers
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller version of these that only went to 80°, so I decided to get the taller one. There thermometers are very accurate & fun to watch the balls move up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, often gets compliments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother as his old one got broken. He loves it. Guests often compliment it. Nice addition to the living room. Overall, very pleased. Packaging: I was worried when I got the package because it had obviously been tossed around lot, but the thermometer was safe and sound surrounded by its sterofoam container inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Liz A Spitfire

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and noticeable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a feature piece on the living room shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Block

customer_reviews.title: Functional and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Just as it appears. Great colors in the internal globes, easy to read tags (and pretty accurate). I would actually like it even better if it were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! They loved it and it's so unique
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a move in gift for a friend who just bought a new house. Perfect! They loved it and it's so unique.

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and works fairly well as far as showing temps. 4 degree differences. But that is no big deal.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: It is remarkable just how pretty this item is. Since I have central heat and air I don't see the temperature fluctuating in my house that much; hence I dont expect much movement with the inner bulbs. But it is to cool and very pretty.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Twice, Arrived Broken Twice.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this item twice and it arrived broken both times. Don't bother. Now I have to go to the trouble of taking it to UPS to return it. Useless. Very disappointed. XoXo - Ruined Birthday. :(
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Stamper

customer_reviews.title: I love it got it for my husband I know he ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it got it for my husband I know he will love it, he has always wanted one. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte M.

customer_reviews.title: No one can stop talking about how unique they are and how cool it is to see it telling the temperature
customer_reviews.text: I have given 3 of these as gifts and everytime they have stolen the show. No one can stop talking about how unique they are and how cool it is to see it telling the temperature. It is exactly as pictured and is absolutely gorgeous. Would recommend this for anyone.

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely satisfied and I am looking forward for more acquisitions
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 24" model. I have to say that I am impressed, the thermometer is HUGE!, it looks massive and gorgeous. Although it is glass, it arrived safely and very carefully packaged. I am also impressed that I order the Celsius model and I received the correct model; being honest, I was expecting that my order was going to be messed up and instead get the Fahrenheit model. I am extremely satisfied and I am looking forward for more acquisitions.

customer_reviews.text: We had one of these and broke it. We immediately ordered another because it's such a interesting decorative item.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful addition to any home and has the added benefit of giving you an idea of the temperature although not as accurate as a digital thermometer but much prettier to look at.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking addition to our collection.
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t have accurate readings. It has 11 spheres and they seem to get hung up on each other. Nice looking addition to our collection though.

customer_reviews.title: A Unique Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a unique gift. Perfect for someone interested in science or just an attractive gift for someone who wants something a little different. It's also functional as it tells the temperature.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my granddaughter. It came right on time and the packaging was phenomenal. I was worried that it might break in shipment but it was perfect!

customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Balls were described as having 2 degree F calibration but in fact had the common 4 degree F calibration. I ordered this specifically because of the more precise calibration that was advertised. I returned this item with no trouble. It was well packed and arrived in good shape.

customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Shipping it back for a return was too expensive! Bought it for a gift, disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, but I'll keep it anyway.
customer_reviews.text: This item was packaged very well and looks nice. However, the description lists the temperature range as 64 to 84 degrees, measured in 2 degree increments. The actual item I received has a temperature range of 60 to 100 degrees, measured in 4 degree increments. I specifically chose this one over another that offered 3 degree increments because I preferred the greater precision of this item. So much for that. :/ I don't want to hassle with a return, so I'll keep it, but shoppers be warned, you may not receive the item described.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is like the one I was replacing because I dropped it ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have broke out my tape measure. The picture shows the taller one, which is like the one I was replacing because I dropped it and broke the 'reservoir tip.' But the shorter one came. I measured it and the description was correct, just the picture was wrong. Stupid me.... But it still serves the purpose... Like my girlfriend says sometimes.... I wish it was bigger....

product_meta.title: H-B DURAC Galileo Thermometer; 64 to 80F, 5 Spheres, 280mm (B62000-0800)
product_meta.description: Size:11" Height, 64°F to 80°FSize:11" Height, 64°F to 80°F Size:11" Height, 64°F to 80°F Decorative functional thermometer is a great conversation piece perfect for the home or office Research, industrial and healthcare professionals rely on SP Scienceware for their sample handling needs. Sold worldwide, Bel-Art and H-B Instrument brand laboratory supplies include over 5,000 items from safety wash bottles to fume hoods, thermometers, racks, desiccators, hydrometers, ice buckets, scoops and spoons. Custom calibration services, plastic molding, specialty coatings and wire manufacturing are also available. Wilmad-LabGlass brand laboratory glassware complements Bel-Art and H-B Instrument with over 7000 items including NMR and EPR consumables and specialty glassware, as well as custom fabrication for individual glassware, glass repair services and OEM glass parts. SP Scienceware is a division of Warminster, PA based SP Industries which also include SP Scientific laboratory, thermal management, and pharmaceutical production equipment and SP Ableware aids for daily living.
feature_bullets: Galileo thermometer with temperature tags attached to colorful glass balls that rise and fall to indicate room temperature
Temperature range of 64 to 80 degrees F, in 4-degree F increments, with an accuracy of +/- 2 degrees F (1 degree C)
Glass balls, filled with colored liquid of varying densities, rise or fall with changing temperature inside a sealed glass cylinder filled with clear liquid
Lowest sphere in the top grouping indicates temperature
Model has five spheres and is 11" tall

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars276 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
